name: Hakan's War Manager
description:
We're big fans of the Kingdom manga/anime (highly recommend watching, but bear with the first season's graphics), and we wanted to bring that intense tactical battle spirit into our game, where players can outsmart the opponent just like the tacticians in the series. Also, we're taking big inspiration from the Football Manager and Total War series (heavily from Championship Manager 03/04 and Medieval: Total War). Our goal is to create a tactical wargame in a manager's setting.

Be a Tactician

You are a tactician. As a tactician, you must develop effective battle tactics that can win the battle.

Real-Time Battles

You can monitor the implementation of your tactics and intervene at critical moments.

Scout

To become a champion of the league, you must recruit leaders who are suitable for your tactic.

Training

Train your leaders so they can reach their full potential.

League System

Like in Football Manager, we have a league system. Where you can become the champion of the league and earn the title of "Hakan" - Khan of the Khans.
